channel.title: CVE Feed for OSIsoft -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OSIsoft -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-9641|2024-08-05T17:11:02.371Z -- osisoft -- pi%20coresight
item.description: PI Coresight 2016 R2 contains a cross-site request forgery vulnerability that may allow access to the PI system. OSIsoft recommends that users upgrade to PI Vision 2017 or greater to mitigate this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-19006|2024-08-05T11:23:09.033Z -- osisoft -- pi%20vision
item.description: OSIsoft PI Vision, versions PI Vision 2017, and PI Vision 2017 R2, The application contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability where displays that reference AF elements and attributes containing JavaScript are affected. This vulnerability requires the ability of authorized AF users to store JavaScript in AF elements and attributes.
